DataElement.preferredName: Other Pacific Islander Race Category Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text description of a person's self-described Pacific Islander racial origination that is different from the choices previously identified.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. The term covers particularly people who identify themselves as part-Hawaiian, Native Hawaiian, Guamanian or Chamorro, Carolinian, Samoan, Chuukese (Trukese), Fijian, Kosraean, Melanesian, Micronesian, Northern Mariana Islander, Palauan, Papua New Guinean, Pohnpeian, Polynesian, Solomon Islander, Tahitian, Tokelauan, Tongan, Yapese, or Pacific Islander, not specified. The concept refers also to individuals who classify themselves as described below.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Other Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander Race
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. The term covers particularly people who identify themselves as part-Hawaiian, Native Hawaiian, Guamanian or Chamorro, Carolinian, Samoan, Chuukese (Trukese), Fijian, Kosraean, Melanesian, Micronesian, Northern Mariana Islander, Palauan, Papua New Guinean, Pohnpeian, Polynesian, Solomon Islander, Tahitian, Tokelauan, Tongan, Yapese, or Pacific Islander, not specified. The concept refers also to individuals who classify themselves as described below.:Major living subspecies of man differentiated by genetic and physical characteristics. There are four racial groups: Australoid, Caucasoid, Mongoloid, and Negroid.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.longName: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. (OMB)
A geographic ancestral origin category that is assigned to a population group based mainly on physical characteristics that are thought to be distinct and inherent.

Property.preferredDefinition: This term is used informally to mean a class of things.

Concepts.definition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text description of the patient's/participant's racial orgination.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: general description of an individual's physical appearance and vital status.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Changed max length from 100 for harmonization.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support the Health in Women (HOW) study
